item.title: SYBAU: You Are Not Tracking Anyone With an IP Address
item.description:
Kinda random article, why?

I keep hearing a ton of misinformation about how you can supposedly use an IP address to track a person. Iâ€™ve also been a bit rusty on networking fundamentals, so this is a good excuse to refresh them.

Learning by teaching.

What in the world is an IP address?

An IP address is a logical addressing system used to identify a network interface so data can be routed across networks.
